class  evolve::SocketMethods
 A class that wraps around socket methods Provides a message boundary facility
Unless otherwised noted, a method that returns a bool returns true on success, false on failure This is a class (instead of the more apt abstraction, the namespace) because I want to do stuff like inherit from the CommonAspect Also, I think I like the idea of a delimiter on a per object basis? This is still an open issue in my head though. More...
